faq: â“ FAQ Q: What is PokeDex? A: PokeDex is actually an updated version bot developed by @Warning_MadBoy_is_Back, which acts as a helper for trainers on Telegram. You can check information of PokÃ©mon, and check effectiveness; weakness of PokÃ©mon types as quickly as possible, without ever leaving Telegram Q: How to get Pokemon informations? A: Just write Pokemon name after /data command (Eg.: /data Mewtwo) Q: How can I help? A: You can help me in several ways: - Pull Request/Issue on PokeDex GitHub Repository - Report me tips/bugs in private (@Warning_MadBoy_is_Back)
